https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/3Oto4m94iirzlTD5v0y7jXv0qsg.jpg When he takes his girlfriend to a seedy abortion clinic in the back room of a combination hair salon / bordello, Guy Maddin meets the madam’s daughter and falls in love. But she won’t let any man touch her until her father’s murder has been avenged. Cowards Bend the Knee
